name: Bug Out
description:
This game was made for Global Game Jam 2019 with the theme "What does home mean to you?" You play as an ant that lives in a vacant home that is now going through renovations. Try to survive their attempts to clear you out with a vacuum cleaner while you search for a new place to stay. 

Credits:

  • Level Generation/Design, Jumping Mechanic, Spider Movement - Freez3Fram3
  • Level Design, Player Movement, Obstacles - charliefarlie (https://charliefarlie.itch.io/)
  • Art Assets - Stephanie Lam (Instagram/Twitter: @sohfle)
  • Smoke Effect, Background, Power-ups - Vishal Naik

All sounds and music are in the License file. Controls are in the README.
